content:
The chunk is part of a method in a larger document that defines various GUI widgets (like OptionMenu, Vector3Entry) with specific functionality for creating and managing these widgets in a graphical user interface. The chunk appears after widget creation to assign commands, pack widgets, bind help text, and store them in a dictionary for later reference. It is used consistently across different widget types to ensure uniform setup and management.

The code chunk sits within the overall context of a widget creation framework, specifically handling post-creation setup steps for each widget type.

# Do this after the widget so command isn't called on creation
        widget['command'] = command
        widget.pack(fill = tk.X)
        self.bind(widget, balloonHelp)
        self.widgetDict[category + '-' + text] = widget
        return widget
